data.title: Pujols Surname Origin, Meaning & Last Name History
data.meta_description: Learn the fascinating origin of the Pujols surname; its meaning & distribution. Unlock your family history in the largest database of last names.
data.text:
Where Does The Last Name Pujols Come From? nationality or country of origin

The surname Pujols has its highest incidence in The Dominican Republic. It may also be rendered as a variant:. For other potential spellings of this name click here.

How Common Is The Last Name Pujols? popularity and diffusion

The last name is the 28,465th most frequently used family name worldwide. It is borne by approximately 1 in 386,054 people. The surname is primarily found in The Americas, where 93 percent of Pujols live; 88 percent live in Caribbean and 88 percent live in Hispano-Caribbean. It is also the 1,046,220th most commonly occurring first name globally. It is borne by 84 people.

The surname Pujols is most frequent in The Dominican Republic, where it is held by 16,377 people, or 1 in 637. Beside The Dominican Republic it is found in 20 countries. It also occurs in The United States, where 6 percent live and Spain, where 4 percent live.

Pujols Last Name Statistics demography

In The United States those bearing the Pujols last name are 43.41% more likely to be registered Democrats than The US average, with 96.64% being registered to vote for the political party.

Pujols earn notably less less than the average income. In United States they earn 16.9% less than the national average, earning $35,856 USD per year.
